original_text: As for our Christian friend Apollos, I wanted him to visit you. I have often told him to come to you together with the other believers. But he does not think that this is the right time. He will come to you when he has the chance.
korean_text: 형제 아볼로에 대하여는 그에게 형제들과 함께 너희에게 가라고 내가 많이 권하였으되 지금은 갈 뜻이 전혀 없으나 기회가 있으면 가리라

sentences.original_text: As for our Christian friend Apollos
I wanted him to visit you
to come to you together with the other believers
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 믿는 형제들과 함께 너희에게 오라고

sentences.original_text: that this is the right time
